query:
SELECT 
  id,
  clientId,
  tokenExpiresAt,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, NOW(), tokenExpiresAt) as horas_restantes,
  createdAt,
  updatedAt
FROM bling_config
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2JcS2SMt4kXiaZg.root --database e5hjdPqiFqSfQ5APk99tn8 --execute SELECT 
  id,
  clientId,
  tokenExpiresAt,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, NOW(), tokenExpiresAt) as horas_restantes,
  createdAt,
  updatedAt
FROM bling_config
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 1;
